quote.text: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
quote.author: Audre Lorde

scripture.text: And above all these put on love, which binds everything together in perfect harmony.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine ðŸŒ¸

Just wanted to remind you how much your peace matters to me. When you're calm, when you're happy, when you're smiling... the whole world feels lighter. Itâ€™s like the sky opens up and everything breathes better.

I hope today was great for you... No stress. No noise. Your peace is precious to me. Always rooting for it... always holding space for it.

I always got ya back.
